translations: 旋转，转动；轮流，轮值；轮作，换茬（rotate 的现在分词）

phrs.translation: 转动设备；流体机械设备
旋转式密封；回转式密封装置
n. 转盘，转台；回转工作台

sentences.sentence: In this case, the orbit of the rotating asteroid will very slowly spiral toward the sun.
sentences.translation: 在这种情况下，旋转小行星的轨道将非常缓慢地向太阳旋转。

sentences.sentence: Within the larger ethnic community, rotating credit associations have been used to raise capital.
sentences.translation: 在较大的少数民族社区内，已使用轮流信贷协会来筹集资金。

sentences.sentence: The eventual winner was a plan for the huge rotating steel boat lift which was to become The Falkirk Wheel.
sentences.translation: 最终获胜的是巨大旋转钢制船舶升降机的设计图，它成为了后来的福尔柯克轮。
